entries.title: Switching to Intel Arc - Conclusion!
entries.description:
Check out Thorum using the link below and get 20% off by using the code LTT at checkout:

www.Thorum.com

OK, we tried it. It had its ups and downs but you know what... we're excited for Arc again... for some reason.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1484740-switching-to-intel-arc-conclusion/

Buy an Intel Arc A770: https://geni.us/9IhkN5b

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► COME TO LTX 2023: https://lmg.gg/ltx23
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane
► AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS: https://lmg.gg/masponsors
